attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: It took years just to load, I couldn’t even play beat blade without it lagging it’s not helping me pay my rent. I thought trump helped people who need money but it goes to show how a spoiled orange shrimp boy thinks he’s all that. Anyways Stan Bernie Sanders for clear skin

attributes.title: My life
attributes.review: This app has made me lose my whole family it’s kilt my brother my cousin and my grandmother ❗️I was so stressed out I started doing drug I was raped I kilt a man and went to jail this app has given me anxiety  depression I want apple to delete this app immediately.

attributes.title: I not working
attributes.review: I log in them it remove me from the app it don’t work I saw some inappropriate things on there two this app is bad it be glitching your phone out please report this than you

attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: Ugh this is terrible!! I was so eager to be able to download this app, but it took about 2 hours to download! And when I opened the app it just kept showing orange all over my screen. One star!

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: This app glitched my phone. I wanted to download the app the see if I could like trump again but obviously I can’t. AND the government hacked my phone and started deleting my apps. I am so disjointed in this country. I will NEVER get this app EVER again.

attributes.title: horriblee
attributes.review: When i downloaded it my phone started getting super hot. When i went into the app it made my phone glitch and wouldn’t let me exit the app. I don’t recommend this, it was a waste of time.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took many many days to download and I can’t BELIVE it had the audacity to ask me for a review when it had already made my phone flush, and took tons of my iCloud storage,wouldn’t recommend

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible has the worst quality I have seen in an app before. So terrible. This app is just not worth taking up my space on my phone. I wish it got taken down.

attributes.title: This is probably the worst app on my phone
attributes.review: Ever since I got this app there has been problems with my phone. My phone has been very slow and glitching out. The day after I got this app my dog died. The app is cursed

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: This app is just horrible. Honestly I don’t even know how it made it to the App Store. It glitches often, crashes even more. And on top of all of that the interface is counterproductive and just, disappointing. I hate it
